title: Create Schema Validation Script
description: Create a validation script that checks AI Stories against the schema. Supports V4.1, V4.2, and V4.3 schemas. Provides clear error messages with line numbers and suggestions for fixes.

objective.i_want: to validate my stories against the schema
objective.so_that: I catch errors before they cause agent failures

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN story file provided THEN validation result returned
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Run on valid and invalid stories

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN directory provided THEN all .json files validated
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Run on directory, verify all files checked

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN story has schema_version field THEN correct schema used
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Validate V4.1, V4.2, V4.3 stories, verify correct schema used

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN validation fails THEN error shows line number of issue
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Create story with error, verify line number in message

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN common error found THEN suggestion for fix included
WHEN validation complete THEN exit 0 for pass, 1 for fail
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Check exit codes for valid and invalid stories

reuse_patterns.ajv: Use AJV for JSON Schema validation

notes: This tool should be used in CI/CD to catch schema errors before merge. Consider pre-commit hook integration.
implementation_notes: ❌ NOT STARTED: NOT STARTED. Validation script not implemented. Manual story validation required.
